titles.title: A resolution expressing gratitude and sincere respect for Jesse R. Nichols.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 6/13/2005--Passed Senate without amendment. Expresses: (1) deep gratitude and sincere respect for Jesse R. Nichols, Sr. (first African American Clerk employed by the U.S. Senate) for his unfailing service and dedication to the Senate; and (2) condolences to the family due to his death on February 18, 2005.
